description: This file declares the RecipeRepository class, which provides in-app data management for recipes, including retrieving all recipes, featured recipes, searching, favorites management, and internal data loading and persistence.

classes.name: RecipeRepository
classes.description: A class responsible for managing recipes data, including retrieval, search, and favorites management.

methods.name: RecipeRepository
methods.description: Constructor for RecipeRepository, initializes the repository.

methods.name: allRecipes
methods.description: Returns the list of all recipes.

methods.name: featuredRecipes
methods.description: Returns a list of featured recipes limited by the specified number.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Searches recipes based on the provided query string.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a recipe by its unique identifier.

methods.name: isFavorite
methods.description: Checks if a recipe ID is marked as favorite.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status of a recipe ID.

methods.name: favorites
methods.description: Returns the list of favorited recipes.

methods.name: loadMockData
methods.description: Loads mock recipe data into the repository.

methods.name: loadFavorites
methods.description: Loads favorite recipe IDs from persistent storage.

methods.name: saveFavorites
methods.description: Saves the current favorite recipe IDs to persistent storage.
